Title: The Right Thing to Do
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Aurin Squire, Aurin Squire (story editor), Kay Oyegun (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Jack and Rebecca receive surprising news, Kate tries to help Toby, Randall feels conflicted about William and Jessie, while Kevin must make a choice.
